section.name: Plugin Processor
section.p: The plugin processor is a build listener than handles the production of a Transit plugin descriptor.

tr.td: Create a plugin descriptor using runtime dependencies declared on the current project definition. The produced plugin is created under the ${basedir}/target/deliverables/plugins directory.

subsection.name: Sample plugin descriptor
subsection.pre:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <part xmlns="artifact:xsd:dpml/lang/dpml-part#1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
<info title="Depot Builder"> <description> Ant project builder for Depot. </description> </info>
<strategy xsi:type="plugin" class="net.dpml.tools.impl.StandardBuilder"/>
<classpath> <system> <uri>artifact:jar:ant/ant-launcher#1.6.5</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:ant/ant#1.6.5</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:junit/junit#3.8.1</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:ant/ant-junit#1.6.5</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:ant/ant-xslp#1.6.5</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:ant/ant-trax#1.6.5</uri> </system> <private> <uri>artifact:jar:dpml/transit/dpml-transit-main#SNAPSHOT</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:dpml/transit/dpml-transit-tools#SNAPSHOT</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:dpml/depot/dpml-library#SNAPSHOT</uri> <uri>artifact:jar:dpml/depot/dpml-tools-builder#SNAPSHOT</uri> </private> </classpath>
</part>
